name: Lillet of the Valley
description: Lillet of the Valley is a variation of the Col du Sabion, a drink we first encountered at the Manhattan Cocktail Classic. The lightness of cider combined with the tart and earthy citrus flavors make this drink an excellent companion while watching the sunset from your rooftop.
recipeIngredient: 3 dashes orange bitters, such as Bitter Truth

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice, then add Lillet, Solerno, orange bitters, grapefruit bitters, and Gran Classico. Stir well.
Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Top off with cider. Stir gently to combine and garnish with orange twist.
